text:
*Open Design Manager - button now in Beta.*
<https://github.com/TheWebTech/HubSpot-Developer-Extension/releases/tag/v1.04.4-beta>

Sorry AJ, next release should have keyboard shortcut.

Beta users let us know what you think.

If you are interested in trying the beta version of the Chrome extension here are instructions <https://github.com/TheWebTech/HubSpot-Developer-Extension/wiki/How-to-use-the-Beta-version-of-the-extension>

We honestly need more beta testers, we have about 2% of users are beta testers.

Due to the fact 1,000+ people have the extension installed, we’re going to have to let things sit in beta longer to make sure we’re doing right by everyone.

Kind of related - if anyone speaks another language, and can translate the phrase “Open Design Manager” to the languages you speak, that’d be awesome. Can either post the translation here or in the github issue:
<https://github.com/TheWebTech/HubSpot-Developer-Extension/issues/217>

you don’t need to have any technical skills just language skills.

The new chromium based microsoft edge is available for developers.

Going to have to fire up a windows comp at my house to test the extension on it. :slightly_smiling_face:
<https://www.microsoftedgeinsider.com/en-us/download/>
